channel.title: rust on Ritesh's Ramblings

item.title: Adventures Wasm 1
item.description: Adventures in WebAssembly Land This is Part 1 of my notes on trying out WASM for a non-trivial task. Stay tuned for more fun. I’ve been on the hype-train again, and the flavour of the month (year? decade?) is Web Assembly. During breaks between the job that I’m paid to do, I like to keep up to date on new things and sharpen my technical skills to keep up with the clever people on my team.
